an5.27:4.1: “Mendicants, develop limitless samādhi, disciplined and mindful.
an5.27:4.2: When you develop limitless samādhi, disciplined and mindful, five knowledges arise for you alone.
an5.27:4.4: ‘This samādhi is blissful now, and results in bliss in the future.’ … ‘This samādhi is noble and spiritual.’ … ‘This samādhi is not cultivated by corrupt people.’ … ‘This samādhi is peaceful and sublime and tranquil and unified, not held in place by forceful suppression.’ … ‘I mindfully enter into and emerge from this samādhi.’ …
an5.27:5.1: Develop limitless samādhi, disciplined and mindful.
an5.27:5.2: When you develop limitless samādhi, disciplined and mindful, these five knowledges arise for you alone.”
